column1: Figure 1. Combined state and federal imprisonment rate per 100,000 U.S. residents of a given race or ethnicity, 2008-2018
Data Source:  Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Prisoner Statistics, 2008-2018
Author: E. Ann Carson, Ph.D., BJS Statistician
Figure 1. Combined state and federal imprisonment rate per 100,000 U.S. residents of a given race or ethnicity, 2008-2018
Note: Rates are based on prisoners sentenced to serve more than one year in state or federal prison. See table 5 for rates from 2008 to 2018.
*Includes all races, including those not shown separately in the figure.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Prisoner Statistics, 2008-2018.
